application.Game

Class BaseSprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.Game.BaseSprite
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EvilExam, Louie

    public class BaseSprite
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for all sprite, hold all the basic variables necessary for sprite manipulation and animation.
    Author:
    Nabeel
